    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:16.680

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = Look, we've done this question in the past.
}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:22.400

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:23.400
    | text      = I do not like this kind of gotcha journalism.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:25.400
    | text      = God damn it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:26.400
    | text      = We're going back to the days when I used to try and think up questions.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:29.799
    | text      = So my bright spot is I don't like to generally buy video games as soon as they come out because
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:35.959
    | text      = usually I think they're overpriced on release and typically you can have the exact same
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:39.920
    | text      = experience playing a game two years later and save money.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:44.760
    | text      = Like it's generally, I'm very late to the party almost all the time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:48.519
    | text      = Reasonable shopping.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:50.120
    | text      = However, I made an exception because I had to get Tony Hawk 1 and 2 remastered the second
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:56.400
    | text      = that it came out.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:57.400
    | text      = Of course.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:59.400
    | text      = I played the shit out of those games when they first came out.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:03.879
    | text      = I was just the right age.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:05.640
    | text      = I was unable to skate because I have terrible balance and I'm afraid of falling.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:09.479
    | text      = Of course.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:10.479
    | text      = Of course.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:11.479
    | text      = So I could never be a skateboarder, but skateboarding was so cool.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:13.960
    | text      = It's very cool.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:14.960
    | text      = Just the fluidity of the controls is just so enjoyable.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:18.400
    | text      = It's just a really fun structure of a game.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:21.039
    | text      = I've never had any pretense that I was cool.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:22.800
    | text      = Do you still like it when you're sober now?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:25.199
    | text      = I mean, I don't get high anymore, but yes, it's still so fun.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:29.840
    | text      = Still good?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:30.840
    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:31.840
    | text      = And man, it really, you know, it's kind of limited in terms of like, because Tony Hawk
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:37.599
    | text      = 1 and 2 are really like simple N64 games, the levels were small, it's pretty self-contained
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:43.500
    | text      = with just challenges in them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:45.240
    | text      = So like the game, the last time I played a Tony Hawk game, the levels were enormous.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:49.639
    | text      = Of course.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:50.639
    | text      = And sprawling.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:51.639
    | text      = To teach you a lesson about asking for what you think you want.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:54.680
    | text      = Yeah, and so now it's like going back to that, it's like, oh my god, these are tiny little
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:58.560
    | text      = levels, but it's very satisfying and like, they really did a good job of rendering these
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:04.560
    | text      = areas that I have such visceral memories of skating around in.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:09.240
    | text      = It's just great.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:10.240
    | text      = And then the-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:11.240
    | text      = You totally understand how I feel with the Final Fantasy 7 remake.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:14.000
    | text      = Probably.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:15.000
    | text      = The scenery, just the scenery itself being like, look at me in this environment.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:18.400
    | text      = I think it's a little more like probably visceral and extreme for you, but there's a bit of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:22.759
    | text      = it for me.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:23.759
    | text      = Fair, fair, fair, fair.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:24.759
    | text      = But the thing that really is maybe the parallel is that when I was 17, 18, Tony Hawk 2 was
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:33.639
    | text      = out and there's a challenge in it that you have to hit every gap in the game.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:38.400
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:39.400
    | text      = And I was like, well, I mean, you know, if that's the challenge, I'm up for it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:42.159
    | text      = I'm going to get it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:43.159
    | text      = And so I did.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:44.159
    | text      = I did it forever.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:45.159
    | text      = Of course it did.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:46.159
    | text      = It was super hard.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:47.159
    | text      = What gaps?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:48.159
    | text      = Super annoying.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:49.159
    | text      = I got all of them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:50.159
    | text      = And as I started playing this game, the new one, the remaster version, I noticed that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:56.080
    | text      = they have a gap checklist.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:57.080
    | text      = Oh, no.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:58.080
    | text      = And that makes me think that maybe there is something you get for getting all the gaps.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:02.080
    | text      = So I may be trying to do that again.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:05.919
    | text      = Oh, God damn it, DM.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:09.000
    | text      = I can't believe you're going to try and 100% it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:11.199
    | text      = I might.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:12.199
    | text      = I might.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:13.199
    | text      = I might 100% something.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:14.319
    | text      = But I really, I really do like the ability to just skate around.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:17.920
    | text      = It's kind of mindless game play.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:20.160
    | text      = I enjoy that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:21.160
    | text      = It's meditative in a small way.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:23.800
    | text      = Yeah, a little bit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:24.800
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:25.800
    | text      = So that's my bright spot.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:26.800
    | text      = It's lovely.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:27.800
    | text      = How about you?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:28.800
    | text      = My bright spot, Dan, is that Djokovic is out of the US Open.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:33.079
    | text      = It would not be a bright spot because this is one of the weirdest things that has ever
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:36.800
    | text      = happened in tennis, in ever.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:40.639
    | text      = Today, while playing the game, the world's number one player, perhaps the best tennis
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:45.100
    | text      = player of all time, or at least maybe the most perfectly constructed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:48.279
    | text      = Tell that to Agassiz.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:50.279
    | text      = Accidentally hit a ball that hit one of the line judges in the throat.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:55.199
    | text      = Whoa.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:56.199
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:57.199
    | text      = So he's disqualified.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:58.199
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:59.199
    | text      = So he played one set and then he accidentally hit the line judge and they were like, we
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:01.920
    | text      = can't allow you to do this anymore.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:03.040
    | text      = What?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:04.040
    | text      = So he's out of the US Open.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:05.040
    | text      = That's a weird rule.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:06.040
    | text      = Yeah, it's wild.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:07.040
    | text      = It's wild, isn't it?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:08.040
    | text      = That's a rule?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:09.040
    | text      = It's totally a rule.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:10.040
    | text      = You can't hit a line judge with a ball.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:11.040
    | text      = Well, obviously you can't intentionally.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:12.040
    | text      = Of course not.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:13.040
    | text      = It's an accident.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:14.519
    | text      = But you can't allow any kind of mitigating, oh, well, this is an accident and this isn't
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:20.399
    | text      = an accident.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:21.399
    | text      = I guess then you could fake an accident.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:22.399
    | text      = No tolerance, exactly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:23.399
    | text      = That's weird.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:24.399
    | text      = Or you could argue on your behalf and that kind of stuff.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:26.319
    | text      = That's really strange.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:27.319
    | text      = It is.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:28.319
    | text      = Is the guy's throat okay?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:29.319
    | text      = She is doing just fine.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:31.040
    | text      = Okay, that's good.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:32.040
    | text      = Because he can hit those balls pretty fast.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:33.040
    | text      = Oh, you can hit it 130 miles an hour.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:35.399
    | text      = Yeah, that could do some real damage to a throat.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:36.399
    | text      = Yeah, he could kill somebody with a throat.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:38.399
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:39.399
    | text      = But that means, Dan, for the first time in like 10 years, somebody under the age of 25
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:44.560
    | text      = is probably going to win a major.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:46.879
    | text      = Whoa.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:47.879
    | text      = It has been 10 years.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:48.879
    | text      = I can see your excitement here.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:50.439
    | text      = I'm very excited.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:51.439
    | text      = I apologize that I don't share it, but it's basically the same thing as my excitement
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
